## Load the package

```{r}
library(TBSignatureProfiler)
library(glmnet)
library(ROCR)
library(bioDist)
library(readr)
library(boot)
library(gmodels)
library(DESeq2)
library(caret)
library(e1071)

```

## Load toy dataset

We are using a Indian TB dataset as a toy dataset.

```{r}
data_toy <- readRDS("../data/TB_indian.rds")
load("../data/TBsignatures.rda")
```


## Data normalization

```{r}
data_toy_norm <- deseq2_norm_rle(data_toy$count.indian)
```


## Signature evaluation 

```{r}
quantitative.result <- SignatureQuantitative(data_toy_norm,
                                             data_toy$meta.indian$label,
                                             TBsignatures,
                                             names(TBsignatures),
                                             num.boot = 5)
```
